charges.charge_disposition: Bureau of Prisons for 262 months. this term consists of 240 months on each of Counts One and Two, to be served concurrently; and 120 months on each of Counts Three and Four, to be served concurrently; further, 98 months to be served concurrently to Counts One and Two and 22 months to be served consecutively to Counts One and Two. Supervised release for Life under terms and conditions of US Probation Office and General Order 05-02. Pay the United States special assessment of 400.00 which is due immediately. All fines waived.
